Then student should see the app modules in the header
And the modules should be navigated once clicked from the header
Expected Result:
1. Student should able to see the 4 modules in the home page
a. Home, 
b. Homework
c. Class updated
d. Self Study
Author: Sakshi

Test Scenario: Verify topic card UI for unlocked & locked topics
Test Case: Validate that unlocked topics show progress badge and locked topics appear disabled
Pre-Condition: Student logged in ‚Üí Self-study ‚Üí Mathematics subject available
Test Steps: Given the student is on the Self-study Mathematics topics pageWhen the list of topics is displayedThen unlocked topics should show a green progress badge (e.g., 3/5)And locked topics should appear disabled/light grey with no badge
Expected Result: Unlocked topics show progress count; locked topics are greyed out with "-"
Author: Sakshi

Test Case: Verify student can open a chapter and see Revision + topic list
Pre-Condition: Student in Self-study ‚Üí Mathematics topics visible
Test Steps: Given the student is on the topics listWhen the student taps an unlocked topic (e.g., Rational Numbers)Then the chapter detail screen should loadAnd Revision card + Mindmap button should be visibleAnd topic-wise practice list should appear
Expected Result: Chapter detail page loads with Revision, Mindmap, topic list
Author: Sakshi

Test Case: Verify tapping Mindmap opens mindmap screen
Test Steps: Given the student is on the chapter detail pageWhen the student taps the Mindmap buttonThen the mindmap screen should open successfully
Author: Sakshi

Test Scenario: Validate expansion of a topic to show practices

Test Scenario: Validate Resume action for Assessment Practice

Test Case: Verify student can load more practice activities
